gameDetails.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles â€“ "Ranzak" Promo Character Card Set
gameDetails.description: Ranzak is a nasty little bugger who likes eating, stabbing, and stealing (not necessarily in that order). Like any other character, he comes complete with character, role, and token cards, and he can be used with any Pathfinder ACG set, so feel free to let him pillage his way through Rise of the Runelords.
